# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O sdnhub-driver-huawei-overlay-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/sdnhub/driver-huawei-overlay/overlayvpndriver-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/overlayvpndriver-deployment-1.1.0-20170127.062128-1.zip" && unzip -q -o -B sdnhub-driver-huawei-overlay-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip && rm -f sdnhub-driver-huawei-overlay-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip
EXPOSE 8536
RUN echo Open-O sdnhub-driver-huawei-overlay 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/sdnhub/driver-huawei-overlay/overlayvpndriver-deployment/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/overlayvpndriver-deployment-1.1.0-20170127.062128-1.zip" > OPENO_VERSION
